welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Rutherford, a charming city known for its lively culture and beautiful attractions. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in all that this wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves primarily domestic and Canadian flights for airlines such as United, Air Canada, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves primarily international and domestic flights for airlines such as American, Delta, and Spirit.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves primarily domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic flights for Delta Air Lines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for United Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for JetBlue Airways and its regional partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines and is the largest terminal at JFK.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for British Airways and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is the newest addition to Westchester County Apt Airport, featuring modern facilities and convenient access to major airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with free access for the first 30 minutes.
